about_the_game:
Humans & Vampires is a cooperative tower defense game for 1-8 players set in a dark medieval fantasy age, where an eternal conflict between humans and vampires lives. Manage your base, defend it with towers and upgrade buildings to defeat your enemies and survive.



Inspired by the popular custom map "Vampirism" from Warcraft 3, Humans & Vampires emerges as an adaptation in cooperative multiplayer format that will promise players hours of entertainment thanks to the various systems that innovate in the Tower Defense genre. Some of the features are:


  • Build and upgrade your base
  • Build and upgrade turrets
  • Play with different characters
  • Improve your skills
  • Manage your economy

THE BEGGINING

In Humans & Vampires, players will start in the center of the map, and will have time to choose a base and conquer it, before the vampire awakens and begins the hunt.

YOUR BASE, YOUR SAFE PLACE

In your base, you will be able to build a great variety of buildings that will allow you to defend yourself from the vampire. You will be responsible for managing gold, wood, and more resources that will be necessary to improve all kinds of buildings and turrets.

VAMPIRES

Once you conquer your base, you must defend it from the vampire, who will roam the map looking for victims. The vampire will get stronger as it destroys your allies, so you should consider not feeding it.

THE WALL

The wall is the most important element for your survival, since without it, the vampire will be able to enter your base and eat you. Don't worry, you can improve it as the game progresses.


In Humans & Vampires you will have a character progression system that will allow you to obtain new skills and become stronger. You will have to cooperate with your teammates to defeat the vampire and hold out for as long as possible.
